description:
A warm baselayer set for youngsters who love the outdoors. The gridded fabric holds in warmth and a wicking technology keeps them dry, fending off chills.

  • Mid-weight recycled polyester has a waffle pattern to trap body heat
  • FlashDry™ wicking technology keeps little ones dry
  • Smooth elastic waistband, sleeve cuffs and leg cuffs for a secure fit
name: The North Face Waffle Base Layer Set - Children
